briefTitle: This Trial is a Randomised, Multicentre, Investigator-blind, Vehicle and Comparator-controlled, Parallel-group Trial With the Purpose of Evaluation Efficacy, Safety and Convenience of the MC2-01 Cream
officialTitle: A Randomised, Multicentre, Investigator-Blind, Parallel-Group Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of MC2-01 Cream Compared to Vehicle and Active Comparator in Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Psoriasis Vulgaris
summary: This trial is a randomized, investigator-blind, multicentre, vehicle- and comparator-controlled, parallel-group trial with the purpose of evaluating the efficacy, safety and convenience of the MC2-01 cream.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Change in mPASI (Modified Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) Score
